At the start of round, if unit is affected by Night Chick Shielder???'s 'Restoration System Control', grant unit 'Battle Continuation' with 60000 HP / Status Resist +66% for 1 round.
If 'Battle Continuation' activates while affected by 'Restoration System Control', grants unit 'Chick Permanent Restoration' / 'Battle Continuation' with 120000 HP permanently.
At the start of round, if unit is affected by 'Chick Permanent Restoration', grants unit ATK +20% / ACC +40% / CRIT +5% / EVA +20% / SPD +10% permanently.
These effects cannot be removed by buffs removal.

Skill_MP_NightChick_C_5.title: askill5
Skill_MP_NightChick_C_5.name: Chick Restoration System Error
Skill_MP_NightChick_C_5.description: At the start of round, if unit is affected by 'Restoration System Error', removes 'Battle Continuation' buffs and inflicts 'Damage Taken Increased' +25% to unit for 1 round.

Skill_MP_NightChickM_C_1.title: askill1
Skill_MP_NightChickM_C_1.name: Chick Missile
Skill_MP_NightChickM_C_1.description: Deals $(1.2) damage to a single target with 75% chance to inflict DEF -40% / 'Damage Taken Increased' +25% for 5 rounds and 75% chance to remove buffs.

Skill_MP_NightChickM_C_2.title: askill2
Skill_MP_NightChickM_C_2.name: Full Open Chick Missile
Skill_MP_NightChickM_C_2.description:
Deals $(1.2) damage to target area with Ignore Protect.
Additional DMG +50%, removes buffs and inflicts 'Stunned' / DEF -80% for 2 rounds to Heavy enemies.

Skill_MP_NightChickM_C_3.title: askill3
Skill_MP_NightChickM_C_3.name: Chick Formation (Launcher)
Skill_MP_NightChickM_C_3.description: At the start of round, grants allies in Area of Effect ATK +20% / CRIT +5% / SPD +10% for 1 round.

Skill_MP_NightChickM_C_4.title: askill4
Skill_MP_NightChickM_C_4.name: Chick Restoration System
Skill_MP_NightChickM_C_4.description:
At the start of round, if unit is affected by Night Chick Shielder???'s 'Restoration System Control', grant unit 'Battle Continuation' with 50000 HP / Status Resist +66% for 1 round.
If 'Battle Continuation' activates while affected by 'Restoration System Control', grants unit 'Chick Permanent Restoration' / 'Battle Continuation' with 100000 HP permanently.
At the start of round, if unit is affected by 'Chick Permanent Restoration', grants unit ATK +20% / ACC +40% / CRIT +5% / EVA +20% / SPD +10% permanently.
These effects cannot be removed by buffs removal.

Skill_MP_NightChickM_C_5.title: askill5
Skill_MP_NightChickM_C_5.name: Chick Restoration System Error
Skill_MP_NightChickM_C_5.description: At the start of round, if unit is affected by 'Restoration System Error', removes 'Battle Continuation' buffs and inflicts 'Damage Taken Increased' +25% to unit for 1 round.

Skill_MP_NightChickS_C_1.title: askill1
Skill_MP_NightChickS_C_1.name: Chick Finishing Blow
Skill_MP_NightChickS_C_1.description: Deals $(1.5) to a single target. Additional DMG +500% and removes buffs to targets affected by Night Chick?'s or Night Chick Launcher??'s debuffs.

Skill_MP_NightChickS_C_2.title: askill2
Skill_MP_NightChickS_C_2.name: Chick Upgrade Preparation
Skill_MP_NightChickS_C_2.description: Grants target ally 'Chick Upgrade Preparation' / Target Protect for 5 rounds.

Skill_MP_NightChickS_C_3.title: askill3
Skill_MP_NightChickS_C_3.name: Chick Shield Defense (Advanced)
Skill_MP_NightChickS_C_3.description:
At the start of each round, grants unit All Resist +75% for 1 round and removes all debuffs.
When unit is attacked, grants unit 'Chick Shield Raise' / DEF +50% for 2 rounds.
When unit is attacked whiled affected by 7 or more stacks of 'Chick Shield Raise', removes all DEF buffs on units and grants unit 'Counterttack' with 100% Power / 'Minimize Damage' for 1 round that cannot be removed.

Skill_MP_NightChickS_C_4.title: askill4
Skill_MP_NightChickS_C_4.name: Chick Restoration System Control
Skill_MP_NightChickS_C_4.description:
At the start of round, grants all allies 'Chick Restoration System Control'.
At the start of round, if unit is affected by 7 stacks of 'Chick Shield Raise', grants all allies 'Restoration System Error' and removes 'Chick Restoration System Control'.

Skill_MP_NightChickS_C_5.title: askill5
Skill_MP_NightChickS_C_5.name: Chick Upgrade
Skill_MP_NightChickS_C_5.description:
At the start of round, grants all Attacker / Supporter allies affected by 'Chick Upgrade Preparation' 'Chick Upgrade' / ATK +20% / ACC +40% / CRIT +5% / EVA +20% / SPD +10% permanently.
If the number of 'Chick Upgrade' stacks is 4 or more, also grants Defense Penetration +100% / Ignore Barrier / DR for 1 round.
If the ally is a Defender, removes buffs and inflicts 'Damage Taken Increased' +100% for 1 round instead.

Skill_MP_EmperorChickSpCH_N_1.title: askill1
Skill_MP_EmperorChickSpCH_N_1.name: Chick MachineCannon
Skill_MP_EmperorChickSpCH_N_1.description:
Deals $(1) damage to a single target, and chances to inflict random debuffs for 2 rounds:
40% chance to inflict ATK -50%.
40% chance to inflict ACC -50%.
40% chance to inflict DEF -50%.
40% chance to inflict EVA -50%.
50% chance to inflict 'Damage Taken Increased' +50%.

Skill_MP_EmperorChickSpCH_N_2.title: askill2
Skill_MP_EmperorChickSpCH_N_2.name: Chick Final Attack of Fury
Skill_MP_EmperorChickSpCH_N_2.description: Deals $(1.5) damage to target area. Less damage further the target is from center of AoE. Additional DMG +50%.

Skill_MP_EmperorChickSpCH_N_3.title: askill3
Skill_MP_EmperorChickSpCH_N_3.name: Straggler
Skill_MP_EmperorChickSpCH_N_3.description:
When an ally is defeated, Chick Commander gains 'Vengence' stack for 5 rounds, and when affected by 10 stacks of 'Vengence', Chick Commander gains 'Rising Fury' and uses 'Chick Final Attack of Fury'. When an enemy is defeated, Chick Commander is inflicted with 'Dissipated Anger', and won't gain 'Vengence' stack.
'Vengence' : ATK +15% / DEF +25% / ACC +50%
'Rising Fury' : Will use 'Chick Final Attack of Fury'.
'Dissipated Anger' : ATK -50% / DEF -80% for 3 rounds.

Skill_MP_EmperorChickSpCH_N_4.title: askill4
Skill_MP_EmperorChickSpCH_N_4.name: Commanding Concentration
Skill_MP_EmperorChickSpCH_N_4.description:
At the start of round, Chick Commander gains 'Commanding Concentration'.
'Commanding Concentration' : Unremovable Status Resist +80%.

Skill_MP_EmperorChickSpCH_N_5.title: askill5
Skill_MP_EmperorChickSpCH_N_5.name: Order
Skill_MP_EmperorChickSpCH_N_5.description:
At the start of round, grant Iron Parasites surroudning Chick Commander 'Grit', and also have chance to grants 'Attack Order'.
'Grit' : Unremovable 'Battle Continuation' with 100 HP.
'Attack Order' : High chance to Defense Penetration +30% / Ignore Barrier / DR.

Skill_MP_NightChickSpCH_N_1.title: askill1
Skill_MP_NightChickSpCH_N_1.name: Diversive Machinegun Shot
Skill_MP_NightChickSpCH_N_1.description: Deals $(1) damage to a single target, and inflict DEF -20% for 3 rounds.

Skill_MP_NightChickSpCH_N_2.title: askill2
Skill_MP_NightChickSpCH_N_2.name: Machine Gun Rapid Fire
Skill_MP_NightChickSpCH_N_2.description: Deals $(1.2) damage to a single target, and inflict 'Damage Taken Increased' +30% for 3 rounds.

Skill_MP_NightChickSpCH_N_3.title: askill3
Skill_MP_NightChickSpCH_N_3.name: Grit
Skill_MP_NightChickSpCH_N_3.description:
As long as Chick Commander is on the field, returns to combat with 'Grit' when defeated.
'Grit' : Unremovable 'Battle Continuation' with 100 HP.

Skill_MP_NightChickSpCH_N_4.title: askill4
Skill_MP_NightChickSpCH_N_4.name: Escort
Skill_MP_NightChickSpCH_N_4.description:
At the start of round, Soldier Chick gains 'Commanding Concentration', and moves around Chick Commander until receiving 'Attack Order'.
Low chance to be inflicted with 'Overloaded'.
'Commanding Concentration' : Unremovable Status Resist +100%.
'Overloaded' : Fixed damage to self equal to 5% ATK.

Skill_MP_NightChickSpCH_N_5.title: askill5
Skill_MP_NightChickSpCH_N_5.name: Sacrifice
Skill_MP_NightChickSpCH_N_5.description: At the start of round, if Soldier Chick on frontline, gains Row Protect.

Skill_MP_RampartC_N_5.title: askill5
Skill_MP_RampartC_N_5.name: Offense Formation
Skill_MP_RampartC_N_5.description:
At the start of round, if unit is in the Midline, grant allies in Area of Effect ACC +30% / SPD +20% for 1 round.
If unit is hit with an Electric attack when unit is in the Midline, inflicts ATK -20% / DEF -30% to allies in Area of Effect for 2 rounds.

Skill_MP_FallenC_N_5.title: askill5
Skill_MP_FallenC_N_5.name: Output Limit Release
Skill_MP_FallenC_N_5.description:
At the start of round, if unit is affected by 10 or more 'Output Amplification' stacks, grant unit's Ignore Barrier / DR and Defense Penetration +20% for 1 round.
If unit is hit with an Electric attack while in 'Output Limit Release' state, decrease unit's SPD -50% for 3 rounds.

Skill_MP_StingerC_N_5.title: askill5
Skill_MP_StingerC_N_5.name: Light-Armored Destruction
Skill_MP_StingerC_N_5.description: When evades, grants unit Anti-Light DMG +30% for 3 rounds.

Skill_MP_DroneM_N_5.title: askill5
Skill_MP_DroneM_N_5.name: Heavy-Armored Destruction
Skill_MP_DroneM_N_5.description: At the start of round, if unit is in the Midline, grants allies in Area of Effect Anti-Heavy DMG +30% / Defense Penetration +30% for 1 round that stacks up to 2 times.

Skill_MP_AMG11AA_N_5.title: askill5
Skill_MP_AMG11AA_N_5.name: Network Building
Skill_MP_AMG11AA_N_5.description: When an ally is defeated, increases ACC +50% but decreases ATK -15% of allies in Area of Effect for 5 rounds.

Skill_MP_PuppHeadC_N_5.title: askill5
Skill_MP_PuppHeadC_N_5.name: Operational Circuit Loss
Skill_MP_PuppHeadC_N_5.description: When this unit is hit with Fire Damage, inflicts DEF -20% / SPD -30% for 2 rounds to allies in Area of Effect.

Skill_MP_SeljuqA_N_5.title: askill5
Skill_MP_SeljuqA_N_5.name: Barrel Reinforce
Skill_MP_SeljuqA_N_5.description: When this unit is hit, increases unit's ATK +15% but decreases unit's SPD -10% for 2 rounds.

Skill_MP_GigantesC_N_5.title: askill5
Skill_MP_GigantesC_N_5.name: Recovery Mode
Skill_MP_GigantesC_N_5.description:
At the start of round, if unit's HP is below 10%, enters 'Recovery Mode', granting unit 'Battle Continuation' with 5000 HP.
If unit is hit with an Electric Attack, unit receives 'Recovery Mode Error', taking 3000 Electric DoT damage permanently and removes 'Battle Coninuation' effect.

Skill_MP_NightChickShSv_N_1.title: askill1
Skill_MP_NightChickShSv_N_1.name: Chick Shield Blow
Skill_MP_NightChickShSv_N_1.description: Deals $(1.1) damage to a single target and inflicts Provoked / ATK -20% / CRIT -5% for 2 rounds.

Skill_MP_NightChickShSv_N_2.title: askill2
Skill_MP_NightChickShSv_N_2.name: Chick Protection Initiation
Skill_MP_NightChickShSv_N_2.description: Grants AP +1 / Target Protect for 3 rounds to target ally.

Skill_MP_NightChickShSv_N_3.title: askill3
Skill_MP_NightChickShSv_N_3.name: Chick Defensive Formation
Skill_MP_NightChickShSv_N_3.description: At the start of round, increases unit's SPD +10% / Elemental Resist +15% for 1 round.

Skill_MP_NightChickShSv_N_4.title: askill4
Skill_MP_NightChickShSv_N_4.name: Chick Survival Risk
Skill_MP_NightChickShSv_N_4.description: At the start of round, if unit is affected by 'Wet', inflicts 'Damage Taken Increased' +500% to unit for 4 rounds.

Skill_MP_NightChickCMSv_N_1.title: askill1
Skill_MP_NightChickCMSv_N_1.name: Enhanced Chemical Bomb Launch
Skill_MP_NightChickCMSv_N_1.description: Deals $(0.75) damage to a single target and inflicts 180 DoT damage / SPD -10% for 3 rounds with 50% change to decrease Elemental Resist -15%.

Skill_MP_NightChickCMSv_N_2.title: askill2
Skill_MP_NightChickCMSv_N_2.name: Focused Chemical Bomb Launch
Skill_MP_NightChickCMSv_N_2.description: Deals $(2) damage to a single target and inflicts 180 DoT damage for 3 rounds with 50% change to remove buffs.

Skill_MP_NightChickCMSv_N_3.title: askill3
Skill_MP_NightChickCMSv_N_3.name: Environmental Adaptation System
Skill_MP_NightChickCMSv_N_3.description: At the start of round, grants allies in Area of Effect Status Resist +10% / Elemental Resist +20%.

Skill_MP_NightChickCMSv_N_4.title: askill4
Skill_MP_NightChickCMSv_N_4.name: Chemical Solution Spillage
Skill_MP_NightChickCMSv_N_4.description: At the start of round, if unit is affected by 'Wet', decreases unit's ACC -100% for 4 rounds.

Skill_MP_NightChickCSv_N_1.title: askill1
Skill_MP_NightChickCSv_N_1.name: Flame Burner
Skill_MP_NightChickCSv_N_1.description: Deals $(0.8) Fire damage to a single target with 50% chance to inflict 'Ignited' for 3 rounds.

Skill_MP_NightChickCSv_N_2.title: askill2
Skill_MP_NightChickCSv_N_2.name: Howitzer
Skill_MP_NightChickCSv_N_2.description:
After 1 rounds, deals $(1.75) damage to target area with Ignore Protect.
Additional DMG +50% to targets affected by 'Rooted'.

Skill_MP_NightChickCSv_N_3.title: askill3
Skill_MP_NightChickCSv_N_3.name: Fuel Tank Explosion
Skill_MP_NightChickCSv_N_3.description: When unit is defeated, deals Fire damage equals to 325% ATK to adjacent allies and removes DR buffs.

Skill_MP_NightChickCSv_N_4.title: askill4
Skill_MP_NightChickCSv_N_4.name: Chick Survival Risk
Skill_MP_NightChickCSv_N_4.description: At the start of round, if unit is affected by 'Wet', inflicts 'Damage Taken Increased' +500% to unit for 4 rounds.

Skill_MP_Stalker_EW_1.title: askill1
Skill_MP_Stalker_EW_1.name: 저격
Skill_MP_Stalker_EW_1.description: 레일건 저격으로 $(1) 피해를 주고 공격이 적중 시 높은 확률로 2라운드 동안 행동 불가 상태가 됩니다.

Skill_MP_Stalker_EW_2.title: askill2
Skill_MP_Stalker_EW_2.name: 챠지
Skill_MP_Stalker_EW_2.description: 레일건을 충전해, 다음 공격이 치명타로 적용되며 일정 라운드 동안 공격력이 크게 증가합니다.

Skill_MP_Stalker_EW_3.title: askill3
Skill_MP_Stalker_EW_3.name: 리액터 충전
Skill_MP_Stalker_EW_3.description: 매 라운드마다 리액터가 충전이 되어 Defense Penetration효과가 증가하지만 4 중첩을 넘을 경우 리액터 초기화 상태가 되어 모든 강화 효과가 해제되고 1라운드 동안 행동 불가 상태가 됩니다.

Skill_MP_Stalker_EW_4.title: askill4
Skill_MP_Stalker_EW_4.name: 약점 포착
Skill_MP_Stalker_EW_4.description: 공격 대상의 HP가 낮을수록 주는 피해가 증가합니다.

Skill_MP_Stalker_EW_5.title: askill5
Skill_MP_Stalker_EW_5.name: 리액터 과충전
Skill_MP_Stalker_EW_5.description: 전기 공격에 피격 당할 시 2라운드 동안 공격력이 대폭 감소하고 적용 중인 리액터 충전 효과를 해제 합니다.

Skill_MP_Predator_EW_1.title: askill1
Skill_MP_Predator_EW_1.name: 후려치기
Skill_MP_Predator_EW_1.description: 적 들을 강타해 $(1) 피해를 주고, 1칸 뒤로 밀어내며 일정 확률로 2라운드 동안 행동 불가 상태로 만들고 속성을 흡수한 상태라면 대상에게 해당 속성을 방출하여 지속 피해를 줍니다.

Skill_MP_Predator_EW_2.title: askill2
Skill_MP_Predator_EW_2.name: 오염액
Skill_MP_Predator_EW_2.description: 오염액으로 목표 대상들에게 $(0.5) 피해를 주며, 2라운드 동안 오염 상태로 만듭니다. 오염 상태인 대상은 방어력과 행동력이 감소하며, 지속 물리 피해를 입습니다. 보호 효과를 무시합니다.

Skill_MP_Predator_EW_3.title: askill3
Skill_MP_Predator_EW_3.name: 속성 흡수
Skill_MP_Predator_EW_3.description:
속성 공격에 When this unit is hit 3라운드 동안 해당 속성을 흡수하여 해당 속성의 저항력이 증가하지만 부작용으로 특정 속성의 저항력이 대폭 감소합니다.
화염 속성 흡수 시: 화염 저항력 소폭 증가, 냉기 저항력 대폭 감소
냉기 속성 흡수 시: 냉기 저항력 소폭 증가, 전기 저항력 대폭 감소
전기 속성 흡수 시: 전기 저항력 소폭 증가, 화염 저항력 대폭 감소

Skill_MP_Predator_EW_4.title: askill4
Skill_MP_Predator_EW_4.name: 오염액 누출
Skill_MP_Predator_EW_4.description: HP가 50% 이하가 되면 오염액이 누출되어 적군 전체의 화염,냉기,전기 속성 저항력을 감소시킵니다.

Skill_MP_Predator_EW_5.title: askill5
Skill_MP_Predator_EW_5.name: 보호 본능
Skill_MP_Predator_EW_5.description: 적에게 공격 당할 시 속성 흡수 부작용 효과를 제외한 자신에게 걸려있는 해로운 효과를 해제 합니다.

Skill_MP_Kidnapper_EW_1.title: askill1
Skill_MP_Kidnapper_EW_1.name: 클로 돌진
Skill_MP_Kidnapper_EW_1.description: 클로 돌진으로 목표와 바로 뒤의 대상에게 $(1) 피해를 줍니다. 5라운드 동안 공격 대상의 방어력을 감소시킵니다. 최대 5번까지 중첩됩니다.

Skill_MP_Kidnapper_EW_2.title: askill2
Skill_MP_Kidnapper_EW_2.name: 손톱날 Launch
Skill_MP_Kidnapper_EW_2.description: 폭발하는 손톱날을 발사해 목표 열에 $(1.4) 피해를 주고 대상을 뒤로 한칸 밉니다. 공격 대상들은 2라운드 동안 적중이 감소합니다.

Skill_MP_Kidnapper_EW_3.title: askill3
Skill_MP_Kidnapper_EW_3.name: 회심의 반격
Skill_MP_Kidnapper_EW_3.description: 회심의 반격 준비 태세를 갖춘 상태에서 회피 시 적에게 괴멸적인 피해량으로 반격을 합니다. 회심의 반격 준비 태세가 종료된 후, 다음 1라운드 동안 회피율은 그대로 유지 됩니다.

Skill_MP_Kidnapper_EW_4.title: askill4
Skill_MP_Kidnapper_EW_4.name: 흥분
Skill_MP_Kidnapper_EW_4.description: 피격 당할 시 흥분 상태에 빠져 3라운드 동안 공격력이 증가하고 5중첩 이상이 될 시 2라운드 동안 회심의 반격 준비 태세(회피율 대폭 상승)를 갖춥니다.

Skill_MP_Kidnapper_EW_5.title: askill5
Skill_MP_Kidnapper_EW_5.name: 흥분 진정
Skill_MP_Kidnapper_EW_5.description: 냉기 공격에 피격 당하거나 반격 준비 태세를 갖출 시 적용 중인 흥분 상태가 해제 됩니다.

Skill_MP_Raider_EW_1.title: askill1
Skill_MP_Raider_EW_1.name: 플라즈마 광탄
Skill_MP_Raider_EW_1.description: 전격구를 발사해 $(1.5) 전기 속성 피해를 줍니다. 대상이 감전 상태면 회피를 감소시키며, 일정 확률로 행동 불능 상태로 만듭니다.

Skill_MP_Raider_EW_2.title: askill2
Skill_MP_Raider_EW_2.name: 광탄 Barrage
Skill_MP_Raider_EW_2.description: 방전 공격으로 보호 효과를 무시하고 $(0.5) 전기 속성 피해를 줍니다. 일정 확률로 대상을 감전시켜 3라운드 동안 행동력과 회피를 낮춥니다.

Skill_MP_Raider_EW_3.title: askill3
Skill_MP_Raider_EW_3.name: 교신 프로토콜
Skill_MP_Raider_EW_3.description: Alert 상태로 라운드 개시 시, 인접한 철충들의 적중 감소 효과를 해제하고 적중 / 회피 / 치명타를 증가시킵니다.

Skill_MP_Raider_EW_4.title: askill4
Skill_MP_Raider_EW_4.name: 지원 프로토콜
Skill_MP_Raider_EW_4.description: Alert 상태로 라운드 개시 시, 2라운드 동안 일정 확률로 아군 철충들의 공격을 지원합니다.

Skill_MP_Raider_EW_5.title: askill5
Skill_MP_Raider_EW_5.name: Alert
Skill_MP_Raider_EW_5.description: 통솔하는 철충이 처치된 경우, Alert 상태가 되어 2라운드 동안 행동력과 회피가 증가합니다. 해당 효과는 중첩됩니다.

Skill_MP_UnderWatcherSensor_EW_1.title: askill1
Skill_MP_UnderWatcherSensor_EW_1.name: Lock-on 센서
Skill_MP_UnderWatcherSensor_EW_1.description: 목표 대상을 조준해 표식으로 설정한 후, 받는 피해가 증가하며 회피가 감소한 상태로 만듭니다. AP를 감소시키며, 일정 확률로 강화 효과를 해제합니다.

Skill_MP_UnderWatcherSensor_EW_2.title: askill2
Skill_MP_UnderWatcherSensor_EW_2.name: 다중 Lock-on 시스템
Skill_MP_UnderWatcherSensor_EW_2.description: 목표 대상들을 조준해 표식으로 설정한 후, 받는 피해가 증가하며 회피가 감소한 상태로 만듭니다. 강화 효과를 해제하며, AP를 감소시킵니다.

Skill_MP_UnderWatcherSensor_EW_3.title: askill3
Skill_MP_UnderWatcherSensor_EW_3.name: 조준 보정 시스템
Skill_MP_UnderWatcherSensor_EW_3.description: 라운드 개시 시, 자신의 현재 HP 비율에 따라 주변 장치에게 적중 증가 효과를 줍니다.

Skill_MP_UnderWatcherSensor_EW_4.title: askill4
Skill_MP_UnderWatcherSensor_EW_4.name: Maximum Output
Skill_MP_UnderWatcherSensor_EW_4.description: 에너지 충전 중첩이 3 이상이면, 방해 효과를 걸 확률과 회피가 대폭 증가합니다.

Skill_MP_UnderWatcherSensor_EW_5.title: askill5
Skill_MP_UnderWatcherSensor_EW_5.name: 반응 강화 모드
Skill_MP_UnderWatcherSensor_EW_5.description: HP가 50% 이하가 되면 매 라운드 회피가 증가합니다. 최대 3회까지 중첩됩니다.

Skill_MP_UnderWatcherArm_EW_1.title: askill1
Skill_MP_UnderWatcherArm_EW_1.name: 플라즈마 커터
Skill_MP_UnderWatcherArm_EW_1.description: 플라즈마 커터로 $(1) 피해를 줍니다. 대상이 표식 상태면 피해량이 증가하며, 대상의 방어력을 감소시킵니다.

Skill_MP_UnderWatcherArm_EW_2.title: askill2
Skill_MP_UnderWatcherArm_EW_2.name: 대공 펄스 빔 포
Skill_MP_UnderWatcherArm_EW_2.description:
목표 열에 $(1) 피해를 줍니다.
Additional Anti-Flying DMG+.

Skill_MP_UnderWatcherArm_EW_3.title: askill3
Skill_MP_UnderWatcherArm_EW_3.name: 재 조준
Skill_MP_UnderWatcherArm_EW_3.description: 공격 시, 적중 강화 상태면 적중이 추가로 증가합니다.

Skill_MP_UnderWatcherArm_EW_4.title: askill4
Skill_MP_UnderWatcherArm_EW_4.name: Maximum Output 암
Skill_MP_UnderWatcherArm_EW_4.description: 에너지 충전 중첩이 5 이상이면, 적중과 치명타가 증가하며 반격합니다.

Skill_MP_UnderWatcherArm_EW_5.title: askill5
Skill_MP_UnderWatcherArm_EW_5.name: 긴급 요격 모드
Skill_MP_UnderWatcherArm_EW_5.description: 자신의 HP가 50% 이하인 경우, 라운드 개시 시 AP가 증가합니다.

Skill_MP_UnderWatcher_EW_1.title: askill1
Skill_MP_UnderWatcher_EW_1.name: 확산 플라즈마 입자포
Skill_MP_UnderWatcher_EW_1.description: 지정 범위에 보호 효과를 무시하고 $(0.5) 피해를 주는 확산 입자포를 발사합니다. Additional DMG+ to targets affected by 'Marked'.

Skill_MP_UnderWatcher_EW_2.title: askill2
Skill_MP_UnderWatcher_EW_2.name: 메가 플라즈마 캐논
Skill_MP_UnderWatcher_EW_2.description: 지정 행에 $(2) 피해를 주는 플라즈마 입자포를 발사합니다. 보호 효과를 무시하며, 표식 상태인 대상에게 피해량이 크게 증가합니다.

Skill_MP_UnderWatcher_EW_3.title: askill3
Skill_MP_UnderWatcher_EW_3.name: 특수 합금 발사구
Skill_MP_UnderWatcher_EW_3.description: 라운드 개시 시 에너지 충전 상태인 경우, 공격하기 전까지는 방어력과 효과 저항이 크게 증가합니다.

Skill_MP_UnderWatcher_EW_4.title: askill4
Skill_MP_UnderWatcher_EW_4.name: Maximum Output 왓쳐
Skill_MP_UnderWatcher_EW_4.description: 에너지 충전이 4중첩 이상이면, 공격할 때 방어막과 피해 감소 효과를 무시합니다.

Skill_MP_UnderWatcher_EW_5.title: askill5
Skill_MP_UnderWatcher_EW_5.name: 시스템 복원
Skill_MP_UnderWatcher_EW_5.description: 에너지 충전에 적용 중인 상태에서 자신의 HP가 30% 이하일 경우 HP를 회복하고 전투를 속행을 합니다.

Skill_MP_UnderWatcherGenerator_EW_1.title: askill1
Skill_MP_UnderWatcherGenerator_EW_1.name: 에너지 충전
Skill_MP_UnderWatcherGenerator_EW_1.description: 각 장치들에게 에너지를 전달해, 공격력과 효과 저항을 증가시키며 받는 피해를 1회 무효화합니다.

Skill_MP_UnderWatcherGenerator_EW_2.title: askill2
Skill_MP_UnderWatcherGenerator_EW_2.name: 에너지 실드
Skill_MP_UnderWatcherGenerator_EW_2.description: 에너지 실드를 전개해 피해를 흡수하는 방어막을 부여하고, 상태 이상을 해제합니다.

Skill_MP_UnderWatcherGenerator_EW_3.title: askill3
Skill_MP_UnderWatcherGenerator_EW_3.name: 재충전 개시
Skill_MP_UnderWatcherGenerator_EW_3.description: 스킬 사용 시, 받는 공격을 3회 무효화합니다. 3라운드 동안 받는 피해가 감소하며, 효과 저항이 증가합니다.

Skill_MP_UnderWatcherGenerator_EW_4.title: askill4
Skill_MP_UnderWatcherGenerator_EW_4.name: 제네레이터 쇼트
Skill_MP_UnderWatcherGenerator_EW_4.description: When this unit is hit, 높은 확률로 AP가 감소하며 낮은 확률로 쇼트가 생겨 행동 불능이 됩니다.

Skill_MP_UnderWatcherGenerator_EW_5.title: askill5
Skill_MP_UnderWatcherGenerator_EW_5.name: 제네레이터 파괴
Skill_MP_UnderWatcherGenerator_EW_5.description: 파괴될 경우, 모든 파츠의 강화 효과가 해제되고 행동 불가 상태가 됩니다.

Skill_MP_ExecutionerLB_EW_1.title: askill1
Skill_MP_ExecutionerLB_EW_1.name: Split
Skill_MP_ExecutionerLB_EW_1.description:
Deals $(1) damage to a single target.
If the target is affected by DEF-, Additional DMG+ and removes DR buffs.

Skill_MP_ExecutionerLB_EW_2.title: askill2
Skill_MP_ExecutionerLB_EW_2.name: Skewer
Skill_MP_ExecutionerLB_EW_2.description:
Deals $(1.25) damage to target area with Ignore Protect.
Additional DMG+ to Attacker / Supporter enemies.

Skill_MP_ExecutionerLB_EW_3.title: askill3
Skill_MP_ExecutionerLB_EW_3.name: Attack Link
Skill_MP_ExecutionerLB_EW_3.description: At the start of the round, if unit is affected by ATK+, grants 'Follow Up Attack' to the main body and other parts.

Skill_MP_ExecutionerLB_EW_4.title: askill4
Skill_MP_ExecutionerLB_EW_4.name: 확인 사살
Skill_MP_ExecutionerLB_EW_4.description:
When this unit attacks, increases unit's ATK / CRIT.
When affected by 3 or more ATK+ stacks, grants unit Ignore DR / Defense Penetration
When this unit is hit, removes this effect.

Skill_MP_ExecutionerLB_EW_5.title: askill5
Skill_MP_ExecutionerLB_EW_5.name: Alert Mode Switch
Skill_MP_ExecutionerLB_EW_5.description: When this unit is hit, increases unit's EVA but decreases unit's ATK until the next attack.

Skill_MP_Executioner_EW_1.title: askill1
Skill_MP_Executioner_EW_1.name: Begin Execution
Skill_MP_Executioner_EW_1.description:
Deals $(1) damage to a single target.
If the target is affected by 'Stunned', Additional DMG+ and inflicts 'Stunned' that can not be removed.

Skill_MP_Executioner_EW_2.title: askill2
Skill_MP_Executioner_EW_2.name: Genocide
Skill_MP_Executioner_EW_2.description:
Deals $(1.25) damage to target area with Ignore Protect.
Additional Fire DMG+ and removes buffs if Executioner is affected by 5 or more 'Executioner' stacks.
Consumes 5 'Executioner' stacks.

Skill_MP_Executioner_EW_3.title: askill3
Skill_MP_Executioner_EW_3.name: Executioner
Skill_MP_Executioner_EW_3.description:
When Executioner is hit, increases Executioner's ATK permanently.
When Executioner is affected by 'Attack Link', grants Executioner Ignore Barrier/DR.

Skill_MP_Executioner_EW_4.title: askill4
Skill_MP_Executioner_EW_4.name: Distortion Field
Skill_MP_Executioner_EW_4.description:
Takes only minimal damage.
If Executioner is affected by 5 or more 'Executioner' stacks, takes fixed damage and removes all buffs.

Skill_MP_Executioner_EW_5.title: askill5
Skill_MP_Executioner_EW_5.name: Destructive Instinct
Skill_MP_Executioner_EW_5.description:
When an ally is defeated, enter 'Destructive Instinct' state, becoming 'Stunned' for that round and gaining Defense Penetration+ / ATK+ for 3 rounds.
When Executioner is hit with Elemental Attack while affected by 'Destructive Instinct', high chance to become 'Stunned'.

Skill_MP_ExecutionerRB_EW_1.title: askill1
Skill_MP_ExecutionerRB_EW_1.name: Armor Release
Skill_MP_ExecutionerRB_EW_1.description:
Deals $(1) damage to a single target and inflicts DEF- / 'Damage Taken Increased'.
If the target is already affected by this effect, also inflicts 'Stunned'.

Skill_MP_ExecutionerRB_EW_2.title: askill2
Skill_MP_ExecutionerRB_EW_2.name: Disarming
Skill_MP_ExecutionerRB_EW_2.description:
Deals $(0.75) damage to target area and inflicts ATK- / CRIT-.
If the target is already affected by this effect, also inflicts 'Stunned'.

Skill_MP_ExecutionerRB_EW_3.title: askill3
Skill_MP_ExecutionerRB_EW_3.name: Attack Block
Skill_MP_ExecutionerRB_EW_3.description: At the start of each round, if unit has above 50% HP, Target Protect the main body and other parts.

Skill_MP_ExecutionerRB_EW_4.title: askill4
Skill_MP_ExecutionerRB_EW_4.name: Automatic Defense System
Skill_MP_ExecutionerRB_EW_4.description:
When unit's HP is above 50%, takes only minimal damage and increases unit's Status Resist.
When hit while affected by this effect, gains 'Overflow' stack.
At the start of each round, if unit has 4 or more 'Overflow' stacks, cancels this effect and inflicts 'Stunned' to unit.

Skill_MP_ExecutionerRB_EW_5.title: askill5
Skill_MP_ExecutionerRB_EW_5.name: Multiple Armor Structure
Skill_MP_ExecutionerRB_EW_5.description: When unit's HP is below a certain level, inflicts DEF- / 'Damage Taken Increased' to unit but grants unit EVA+ / SPD+.

Skill_MP_DoomEater_N_EW2_1.title: askill1
Skill_MP_DoomEater_N_EW2_1.name: Energy Extraction
Skill_MP_DoomEater_N_EW2_1.description: When in 'Energy Depletion' state, extract enermy from nearby Ironworm. The engery-extracted Ironworm dies.

Skill_MP_DoomEater_N_EW2_2.title: askill2
Skill_MP_DoomEater_N_EW2_2.name: Death Energy
Skill_MP_DoomEater_N_EW2_2.description: Deals $(1) damage to target area that Ignore Protect. Inflicts unremovable DoT damage.

Skill_MP_DoomEater_N_EW2_3.title: askill3
Skill_MP_DoomEater_N_EW2_3.name: Energy Depletion
Skill_MP_DoomEater_N_EW2_3.description:
After using 'Death Energy', enters 'Energy Depletion' state.
While in 'Energy Depletion' state, ignore 'Taunted' and use 'Energy Extraction'.
After extracting energy, enters 'Energy Buffer' state, minimizng all damage and granting Doom Eater immunity to all farmgul effects.
Doom Eater starts with 'Energy Buffer' state.

Skill_MP_DoomEater_N_EW2_4.title: askill4
Skill_MP_DoomEater_N_EW2_4.name: Energy Absorbtion
Skill_MP_DoomEater_N_EW2_4.description: After using 'Energy Extraction', becomes immune to 'Taunted' and stop acting for 2 rounds. In this state, gives self DEF- / ATK+. 30% chance to reduce an Elemental Resist.

Skill_MP_DoomEater_N_EW2_5.title: askill5
Skill_MP_DoomEater_N_EW2_5.name: Runaway
Skill_MP_DoomEater_N_EW2_5.description:
At the start of round, if Doom Eater is affected by 3 or more stacks of 'Energy Depletion', grants Doom Eater a stack of 'Runaway', increasing ATK+ / ACC+ / Status Resist+ but decreasing DEF-.
At the start of round, if Doom Eater is affected by 5 or more stacks of 'Energy Depletion', grants Doom Eater 'Ignore Barrier / DR'.
'Runaway' stacks cannot be removed and stack indefinitely.

Skill_MP_Executioner_BEW_EW2_1.title: askill1
Skill_MP_Executioner_BEW_EW2_1.name: Execution Initiation
Skill_MP_Executioner_BEW_EW2_1.description: 지정 범위에 $(1) 피해를 주고 대상들에게 처형 낙인 효과를 적용시키며 낮은 확률로 방어막 / 피해 감소 효과를 무시합니다.

Skill_MP_Executioner_BEW_EW2_2.title: askill2
Skill_MP_Executioner_BEW_EW2_2.name: Slaughter
Skill_MP_Executioner_BEW_EW2_2.description: 지정 범위에 $(1) 보호 무시 피해를 주고 추가 화염 피해를 주며, 대상에게 걸려있는 강화 효과를 해제합니다.

Skill_MP_Executioner_BEW_EW2_3.title: askill3
Skill_MP_Executioner_BEW_EW2_3.name: 불멸∙최후
Skill_MP_Executioner_BEW_EW2_3.description:
<불멸의 힘>으로 인해 불멸, 불멸의 대가가 적용됩니다. 불멸이 발동 시 사라져가는 불멸이 적용되고 3중첩 시 불멸의 힘이 사라지고 <최후의 힘>이 발동됩니다.
<최후의 힘>이 발동 시 2라운드 동안 피해가 최소화 되며 When this unit is hit 해로운 효과 해제, 매 라운드마다 일정 확률로 공격력 / 방어력 / 적중률 / Defense Penetration효과 / 속성 저항 능력들이 증가됩니다. 불멸과 최후의 힘으로 발동되는 능력들은 해제 불가합니다.

불멸 : 죽지 않습니다. 불멸의 대가 : 자신의 공격력이 대폭 감소합니다.

Skill_MP_Executioner_BEW_EW2_4.title: askill4
Skill_MP_Executioner_BEW_EW2_4.name: 처형 낙인
Skill_MP_Executioner_BEW_EW2_4.description: Execution Initiation 스킬에 피격 당한 적은 3라운드 동안 해제 불가의 방어력이 감소하는 처형 낙인 효과가 적용됩니다.

Skill_MP_Executioner_BEW_EW2_5.title: askill5
Skill_MP_Executioner_BEW_EW2_5.name: 공포
Skill_MP_Executioner_BEW_EW2_5.description: <최후의 힘>이 적용돼 있을 시 매 라운드마다 바이오로이드들에게 공포심을 심어 일정 확률로 공격력 / 방어력 / 회피율 능력들을 대폭 감소시키고 낮은 확률로 1라운드 동안 행동 불가 상태로 만듭니다.

Skill_MP_DoomEater_N_EW_1.title: askill1
Skill_MP_DoomEater_N_EW_1.name: Energy Extraction
Skill_MP_DoomEater_N_EW_1.description: 주변 철충에게서 에너지를 추출합니다. 그리고 에너지를 추출 당한 철충은 죽음을 맞이 합니다.

Skill_MP_DoomEater_N_EW_2.title: askill2
Skill_MP_DoomEater_N_EW_2.name: Death Energy
Skill_MP_DoomEater_N_EW_2.description: 내부에 저장된 막대한 에너지를 모아, 범위 내 적들에게 $(1) 보호 무시 피해를 주는 Death Energy를 방사합니다. 피격 당한 적은 해제 불가의 지속 물리 피해를 입습니다. 해당 스킬을 사용 시 막대한 에너지를 소비하게 되어 <Energy Depletion> 상태에 빠지게 됩니다.

Skill_MP_DoomEater_N_EW_3.title: askill3
Skill_MP_DoomEater_N_EW_3.name: 에너지 갈망
Skill_MP_DoomEater_N_EW_3.description: 오랫동안 에너지 섭취를 못해 굶주려 있어 주위의 모든 철충들을 먹어 치울 것입니다.

Skill_MP_DoomEater_N_EW_4.title: askill4
Skill_MP_DoomEater_N_EW_4.name: 포식 집중
Skill_MP_DoomEater_N_EW_4.description: 굶주린 둠이터의 눈에는 오로지 에너지 섭취를 위한 철충들을 찾는 것에 집중해 있어 도발에 넘어가지 않습니다.

Skill_MP_DoomEater_N_EW_5.title: askill5
Skill_MP_DoomEater_N_EW_5.name: 광폭화
Skill_MP_DoomEater_N_EW_5.description: 라운드 개시 시 자신에게 <Energy Depletion> 상태가 적용돼 있을 시, <광폭화> 상태에 빠지게 되어 공격력 / 방어력 / 적중 / 효과 저항이 증가합니다. <Energy Depletion> 상태가 2중첩이라면 보호막과 피해 감소 효과를 무시 합니다. <광폭화> 능력은 중첩이 되며 해제 불가입니다.

Skill_MP_SpectorMS_EW_1.title: askill1
Skill_MP_SpectorMS_EW_1.name: Disturbing Electromagnetic Missile
Skill_MP_SpectorMS_EW_1.description: Deals $(1.2) damage to target area and inflicts Status Resist -20% / Range -1 for 2 rounds. This effect can stack up to 2 times.

Skill_MP_SpectorMS_EW_2.title: askill2
Skill_MP_SpectorMS_EW_2.name: Change Mode
Skill_MP_SpectorMS_EW_2.description: Increases unit's ATK +35% / CRIT +20% but inflicts 'Damage Taken Increased' +25% / SPD -20%.

Skill_MP_SpectorMS_EW_3.title: askill3
Skill_MP_SpectorMS_EW_3.name: Mobile Antimatter Force Field
Skill_MP_SpectorMS_EW_3.description: At the start of round, grants adjacent allies 'Nullify Damage' (1 time) for 1 round.

Skill_MP_SpectorMS_EW_4.title: askill4
Skill_MP_SpectorMS_EW_4.name: Combat Pattern Analysis
Skill_MP_SpectorMS_EW_4.description: When unit is hit, grants surrounding allies ACC +35% / CRIT +15% / Status Resist +25% for 3 rounds. This ffect can stack up to 3 times.

Skill_MP_SpectorMS_EW_5.title: askill5
Skill_MP_SpectorMS_EW_5.name: Concealment Deployment
Skill_MP_SpectorMS_EW_5.description: At the start of wave, increases unit's EVA +150%. EVA+ decreases by 50% each round.

Skill_MP_Speaker_N_3.title: askill3
Skill_MP_Speaker_N_3.name: Sound Output Enhancement
Skill_MP_Speaker_N_3.description:
At the start of each round, grants unit a stack of 'Sound Output Enhancement', which is removed when an ally is defeated.
When the number of 'Sound Output Enhancement' is 4, grants unit 'Sound Output Enhancement (Maximum)'.

Skill_MP_Speaker_N_1.title: askill1
Skill_MP_Speaker_N_1.name: Sound Wave
Skill_MP_Speaker_N_1.description: Deals $(0.3) damage to target area that Ignore Protect, and inflicts ATK -30% / CRIT -30% for 3 rounds with 50% chance to Push Back 1 square.

Skill_MP_Speaker_N_2.title: askill2
Skill_MP_Speaker_N_2.name: High Frequency Sound

When hit, gains a stack of 'Readying Barrier Deployment' status, and when it reaches 4 stack, gains 'Barrier Deployed' status, gaining 'Nullify Damage' status for 5 hits for 3 rounds.
If hit while affected by 'Barrier Deployed' status, remove debuffs on itself.
When ally's destroyed, 'Barrier Deployed' is forcefully removed, and inflict self 'Damage Taken Increased' +30% for 3 rounds.

Skill_MP_Nest_EW_5.description: When hit with Elemental Attack while affected by 'Barrier Deployed', inflict a stack of 'Damaged Ejection System' to self, and when hit while affected by 3 stacks of 'Damaged Ejection System', inflict 'Ejection System Destroyed' to self, and become unable to use 'Corrosion'.
